name: Balloon Nonsense
description:
In this infinite runner you play as a balloon dog as it bounds across the desert, avoiding many cacti along the way! Dodge and jump obstacles for as long as you can to get a higher score!

I'm making a game every this year, and despite publishing halfway through February I have completed my January project. It's nothing special and has no sound, but I need to move on. I did enjoy getting in the engine and trying some weird design stuff. Enjoy!
